channel.title: CVE Feed for Openfind -- Mail2000
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Openfind -- Mail2000

item.title: CVE-2019-15071|2024-09-17T00:10:30.678Z -- openfind -- mail2000
item.description: The "/cgi-bin/go" page in MAIL2000 through version 6.0 and 7.0 has a cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability, allowing execution of arbitrary code via ACTION parameter without authentication. The code can executed for any user accessing the page. This vulnerability affects many mail system of governments, organizations, companies and universities.
